tool_description: Validates that cart totals meet minimum order requirements for specific discounts and promotional offers.

discount_requirements.description: List of discount IDs with minimum order requirements

error_messages: Invalid cart subtotal: Cart subtotal must be a positive number.
Invalid discount requirements: At least one valid discount ID must be provided.
Discount not found: One or more discount IDs do not exist in the system.
usage: Provide cart_subtotal and discount_requirements to validate minimum order requirements. Returns validation status for each discount.

overall_valid.description: Whether all minimum order requirements are met

validation_results.description: Validation status for each discount requirement

minimum_amounts_needed.description: Additional amounts needed to meet each requirement

total_shortfall.description: Total additional amount needed for all requirements
